words.def: belly
words.name: Abdomen

words.def: pertaining to the belly
words.name: Abdominal

words.def: a series of bones at the base of the pectoral rays.
words.name: Actinosts

words.def: tapering gradually to a point
words.name: Acuminate

words.def: sharp, pointed
words.name: Acute

words.def: a small fleshy fin which lacks fin rays.
words.name: Adipose fin

words.def: joined together
words.name: Adnate

words.def: pressed against the body
words.name: Adpressed

words.def: the fin on the median line behind the vent
words.name: Anal fin

words.def: the most anterior point of the anal fin base
words.name: Anal fin origin

words.def: a modification of the anal fin of males of certain live-bearing species in the family Goodeidae. It is used to transfer reproductive products to the female during mating.
words.name: Andropodium

words.def: grown firmly together
words.name: Ankylosed

words.def: relating to the front portion
words.name: Anterior

words.def: turned forward
words.name: Antrose

words.def: placed close together
words.name: Approximate

words.def: roughness of surface
words.name: Asperity

words.def: without symmetry
words.name: Asymmetrical

words.def: tapering to a point, usually in reference to a tail
words.name: Attenuate

words.def: pertaining to the axilla or upper angle of the pectoral fin
words.name: Axillary

words.def: an enlarged, pointed scale projecting from the insertion of the pectoral or pelvic fin.)
words.name: Axillary process

words.def: an elongated fleshy projection, usually about the head
words.name: Barbel

words.def: pertaining to the base, at the base
words.name: Basal

words.def: the part of a projection, (commonly a fin), which is connected to the body
words.name: Base

words.def: living at a depth between 1000 m and 4000 m, but well off the bottom
words.name: Bathypelagic

words.def: bottom-dwelling, living on the sea bed
words.name: Benthic

words.def: pertaining to fishes that swim just above the seabed at depths below about 200 m (the edge of the continental shelf)
words.name: Benthopelagic

words.def: having two cusps or points
words.name: Bicuspid

words.def: cleft in two
words.name: Bifid

words.def: forked, or divided into two parts or branches
words.name: Bifurcate

words.def: pertaining to the gills
words.name: Branchial

words.def: the gill opening
words.name: Branchial aperture

words.def: The membrane connecting the branchiostegal rays and enclosing the gill chamber ventrally.
words.name: Branchiostegal membrane

words.def: bony rays supporting the gill membranes behind the lower jaw
words.name: Branchiostegals, Branchiostegal ray(s)

words.def: a stiff hair-like projection
words.name: Bristle

words.def: a bony shield
words.name: Buckler

words.def: species other than the target species that are caught incidentally in a trawl
words.name: Bycatch

words.def: shaped like a canine tooth, conical in form
words.name: Caniniform

words.def: a horny or bony covering encasing the body
words.name: Carapace

words.def: small set conical outgrowths in a close set patch or band; usually refers to a band of close set small conical teeth
words.name: Cardiform

words.def: keeled, having a ridge along the middle line
words.name: Carinate

words.def: a fleshy outgrowth
words.name: Caruncle

words.def: pertaining to the tail
words.name: Caudal

words.def: the tail fin
words.name: Caudal fin

words.def: the region of the body between the end of the anal fin and the base of the caudal fin
words.name: Caudal peduncle

words.def: fringed with eyelash-like projections
words.name: Ciliated

words.def: small, thin appendages, often subdivided into branches.
words.name: Cirri

words.def: singular of cirri (see above)
words.name: Cirrus

words.def: the external reproductive organs of male sharks, rays and chimaeras
words.name: Claspers

words.def: grown together
words.name: Coalesced

words.def: flattened laterally
words.name: Compressed

words.def: joined together
words.name: Confluent

words.def: cone shaped, with a cylindrical base and a pointed tip
words.name: Conical

words.def: a scaly covering behind the pectorals of some fishes
words.name: Corselet

words.def: body colouration which is dark above and lighter below
words.name: Countershading

words.def: having the edge slightly scalloped
words.name: Crenulate

words.def: pertaining to the skin
words.name: Cutaneous

words.def: rough-edged scale
words.name: Ctenoid scale

words.def: smooth-edged scale
words.name: Cycloid scale

words.def: temporary, falling off
words.name: Deciduous

words.def: living on or near the sea bed
words.name: Demersal

words.def: resembling a tree or shrub
words.name: Dendritic

words.def: the "unfolding" of a protein resulting in a lessening of its biological properties. In the case of some fish toxins, denaturing with hot water can lessen painful symptoms.
words.name: Denature

words.def: with tooth-like projections
words.name: Dentate

words.def: a little tooth, having an edge with small projecting teeth, the placoid scales of cartilaginous fishes
words.name: Denticle, denticulate

words.def: flattened from top to bottom
words.name: Depressed

words.def: pertaining to the skin
words.name: Dermal

words.def: a fold of loose skin
words.name: Dewlap

words.def: the flattened head and body of various fishes such as stingrays, which also commonly includes the pectoral and ventral fins
words.name: Disc

words.def: remote from the point of attachment
words.name: Distal

words.def: pertaining to the back
words.name: Dorsal

words.def: the upper (dorsal) surface of the head or body
words.name: Dorsum

words.def: the fin on a fish's back
words.name: Dorsal fin

words.def: the most anterior point of the dorsal fin base
words.name: Dorsal fin origin

words.def: cartilaginous fishes - sharks, rays and allies
words.name: Elasmobranchs

words.def: a cell that generates electricity
words.name: Electrocyte

words.def: extended, drawn out
words.name: Elongate

words.def: with the margin slightly hollowed
words.name: Emarginate

words.def: restricted to a particular region, for example endemic to Australia
words.name: Endemic

words.def: with a smooth margin
words.name: Entire

words.def: referring to organisms living on the bottom surface
words.name: Epibenthic

words.def: referring to organisms living in the region between the surface and 200 m depth
words.name: Epipelagic

words.def: capable of being raised or erected, often referring to spines
words.name: Erectile

words.def: the lure or "bait" on the end of the illicium of some anglerfishes and relatives
words.name: Esca

words.def: living in estuaries
words.name: Estuarine

words.def: scythe-shaped, long, narrow, and curved
words.name: Falcate

words.def: curved like a scythe
words.name: Falciform

words.def: a slender or thread-like structure
words.name: Filament

words.def: thread-like
words.name: Filiform

words.def: fringed at the margin
words.name: Fimbriate

words.def: embryonic tissue which develops into a fin
words.name: Finfold

words.def: a small fin, positioned behind the dorsal or anal fins, that is supported by a ray or rays
words.name: Finlet

words.def: living in rivers
words.name: Fluviatile

words.def: the posterior tip of the fin that is closest to the most posterior point of the fin base
words.name: Free rear tips (of fins)

words.def: a ridge running along the top of the head along the midline
words.name: Frontal ridge

words.def: forked
words.name: Furcate

words.def: tapering towards both ends
words.name: Fusiform

words.def: Armor-like scales coated with ganoin found in gars and bichirs.
words.name: Ganoid scales

words.def: a small, fleshy tube behind the anus in some fishes, from which the sperm or eggs are released; the sex of a fish often can be determined by the shape of its papilla.
words.name: Genital papilla

words.def: the bony arches to which the gills are attached
words.name: Gill arches

words.def: or bony flap that covers the gills, the operculum
words.name: Gill cover

words.def: a series of projections along the posterior edge of the gill arch, the site of gas exchange
words.name: Gill filaments

words.def: membranes covering the gill openings, attached to the branchiostegals
words.name: Gill membranes

words.def: opening behind each operculum, leading to the gills
words.name: Gill opening

words.def: a series of appendages along the anterior edges of the gill arches
words.name: Gill rakers

words.def: organs for breathing the oxygen contained in water, and for excreting carbon dioxide from the blood
words.name: Gills, Branchiae

words.def: the tongue bone
words.name: Glossohyal

words.def: a modification of the anal fin of males of certain live-bearing species in the families Anablepidae and Poeciliidae. It is used to transfer reproductive products to the female during mating.
words.name: Gonopodium

words.def: Sexually ripe
words.name: Gravid

words.def: pertaining to the region behind the chin and between the sides of the lower jaw
words.name: Gular region

words.def: the distance from the tip of the snout (or upper lip) to the most posterior point of the opercular margin
words.name: Head length

words.def: not symmetric (sharks)
words.name: Heterocercal fin

words.def: symmetric
words.name: Homocercal fin

words.def: similarity of features based on common evolutionary descent
words.name: Homology

words.def: a condition resulting in enlargement of areas of bone.
words.name: Hyperostosis

words.def: translucent or transparent
words.name: Hyaline

words.def: the joint between the caudal fin and the last of the vertebrae
words.name: Hypural joint

words.def: the flattened bony plate at the posterior end of the vertebral column, formed from parts of the posterior vertebrae.
words.name: Hypural plate

words.def: fish eggs and larvae
words.name: Ichthyoplankton

words.def: a "fishing rod-like" appendage on the head, usually a modified dorsal fin spine
words.name: Illicium

words.def: overlapping, like the shingles on a roof
words.name: Imbricate

words.def: with a notched margin (often referring to fin membranes)
words.name: Incised

words.def: the front or cutting teeth
words.name: Incisors

words.def: pertaining to the lower side (usually of the head)
words.name: Inferior

words.def: between the dorsal fins
words.name: Interdorsal

words.def: the space between the orbits
words.name: Interorbital

words.def: a structure to facilitate sperm transfer in some internally fertilizating species
words.name: Intromittent organ

words.def: a fleshy flap or lobe-like structure in the eye, short and rounded, simple or multiply branched.
words.name: Iris lappet

words.def: the fleshy projection of the body separating the gill openings
words.name: Isthmus

words.def: pertaining to the throat
words.name: Jugular

words.def: placed near together
words.name: Juxtaposed

words.def: organs involved in excretion and regulation of water balance
words.name: Kidneys

words.def: spear-shaped, gradually tapering toward the extremity
words.name: Lanceolate

words.def: pertaining to the lips
words.name: Labial

words.def: shallow grooves around the lips
words.name: Labial furrows

words.def: small fleshy projections around the lips
words.name: Labial papillae

words.def: at or toward the side
words.name: Lateral

words.def: a series of muciferous tubes forming a raised line along the side of the body
words.name: Lateral line

words.def: tallness and narrowness of the skull - in fish usually refers to "elongate highly compressed transparent, ribbon-like larval stage" (source FishBase glossary)
words.name: Leptocephalic

words.def: a digestive and storage organ
words.name: Liver

words.def: the number of scale rows above the lateral line from the first pored lateral line scale to the caudal fin base.
words.name: Longitudinal series (scales)

words.def: shaped like a crescent moon, with long upper and lower lobes
words.name: Lunate

words.def: the upper jaw, or pertaining thereto
words.name: Maxilla, Maxillary

words.def: the hindmost bones of the upper jaw; preceded by the premaxillaries
words.name: Maxillae, Maxillaries

words.def: pertaining to the middle
words.name: Median, medially

words.def: fins located on the median line of the fish; the dorsal, anal and caudal fins
words.name: Median fins

words.def: between the middle and the sides
words.name: Mediolateral

words.def: A cell (chromatophore) containing melanin or other black pigment
words.name: Melanophore

words.def: a bone of the pectoral arch or shoulder girdle
words.name: Mesocoracoid

words.def: refers to the region of the open ocean between 200 m and 1000 m in depth
words.name: Mesopelagic

words.def: fishes that live in the mesopelagic zone
words.name: Mesopelagic fishes

words.def: the middle stratum of water, well below the surface and well above the seabed. See also mesopelagic.
words.name: Midwater

words.def: fishes that live in the midwater
words.name: Midwater fishes

words.def: blunt and rounded grinding teeth
words.name: Molars

words.def: form and structure of an organism
words.name: Morphology

words.def: producing or containing mucous or slime
words.name: Muciferous

words.def: blocks of lateral trunk muscles
words.name: Myotomes

words.def: blocks of muscle corresponding to number of vertebrae, easily seen in larval fishes and used for identifying specimens.
words.name: Myomeres

words.def: upper surface of the body behind the head and before the dorsal fin
words.name: Nape

words.def: pertaining to the nostrils
words.name: Nasal

words.def: between the nostrils and mouth
words.name: Nasoral

words.def: an inner eyelid
words.name: Nictitating membrane

words.def: a rudimentary of embryonic spinal column
words.name: Notochord

words.def: pertaining to the nape
words.name: Nuchal

words.def: faintly marked, scarcely evident
words.name: Obsolete

words.def: blunt
words.name: Obtuse

words.def: pertaining to the posterior part of the skull
words.name: Occipital

words.def: an eye-like spot
words.name: Ocellus

words.def: pertaining to the eye
words.name: Ocular

words.def: a dermal tooth
words.name: Odontode

words.def: the gullet
words.name: Oesophagus

words.def: the large bone which forms the upper posterior part of the operculum
words.name: Opercle

words.def: the bony flap that covers the gills
words.name: operculum

words.def: pertaining to the operculum
words.name: Opercular

words.def: spine projecting from the operculum (view the fish figure)
words.name: Opercular spine

words.def: the eye socket
words.name: Orbit

words.def: the most anterior point of a fin base
words.name: Origin

words.def: bony
words.name: Osseus

words.def: egg-shaped
words.name: Ovate

words.def: the roof of the mouth
words.name: Palate

words.def: the bones on each side of the palate
words.name: Palatines

words.def: a small fleshy projection(s)
words.name: Papilla (papillae)

words.def: covered with papillae
words.name: Papillose

words.def: pertaining to the breast
words.name: Pectoral

words.def: the anterior or uppermost of the paired fins, which correspond to the anterior limbs of the higher vertebrates
words.name: Pectoral fins

words.def: the bones to which the pectoral fin is attached
words.name: Pectoral girdle

words.def: usually referred to as the caudal peduncle, the region of the body between the end of the anal fin and the base of the caudal fin
words.name: Peduncle

words.def: living on or in the open seas
words.name: Pelagic

words.def: the bones to which the ventral fins are attached
words.name: Pelvic girdle

words.def: paired fins behind or below the pectoral fins
words.name: Pelvic fins

words.def: bones behind the gills in the oesophagus or gullet
words.name: Pharyngeal bones

words.def: teeth within the pharynx
words.name: Pharyngeal teeth

words.def: the back part of the throat, into which the gill slits open
words.name: Pharynx

words.def: a circular light-producing organ on the surface of a fish
words.name: Photophore

words.def: Teeth-like scales found in sharks and rays.
words.name: Placoid scales

words.def: towards the hind end of the fish
words.name: Posterior

words.def: behind the eye
words.name: Postorbital

words.def: anterior to the tail portion
words.name: Precaudal

words.def: two bones forming the front portion of the upper jaw
words.name: Premaxillaries

words.def: spine positioned above and in front of the eye
words.name: Preocular spine

words.def: the bone between the cheek and the gill cover
words.name: Preopercle, preoperculum

words.def: spine projecting from the preopercule (see preopercle) (view the fish figure)
words.name: Preopercular spine

words.def: the area under and in front of the eyes
words.name: Preorbital

words.def: capable of extending forward
words.name: Protractile

words.def: capable of extending forward, often referring to the jaws of fishes
words.name: Protrusible

words.def: nearest
words.name: Proximal

words.def: small gills developed on the inner side of the gill cover
words.name: Pseudobranchiae

words.def: stiff ossified lobes or prongs in the tip of the intromittent organ
words.name: Pseudoclasper

words.def: an internal cartilage or bone that supports a median fin ray or spine
words.name: Pterygiophore

words.def: finger-like pouches connected with the alimentary canal (the gut)
words.name: Pyloric caecae

words.def: one branch or one half of the jaw
words.name: Ramus

words.def: a jointed, segmented rod which supports a fin
words.name: Ray

words.def: turned backward
words.name: Retrose

words.def: a projecting snout or beak
words.name: Rostrum

words.def: rough
words.name: Rugose

words.def: pertains to the pattern/arrangement/presence of scales
words.name: Scalation

words.def: any external horny or bony plate
words.name: Scute

words.def: notched like a saw
words.name: Serrate

words.def: bristles or hairs
words.name: Setae

words.def: the posterior part of the dorsal fin which is composed of jointed rays
words.name: Soft dorsal

words.def: shovel-like; having a broad, flat and rounded shape
words.name: Spatulate

words.def: a sharp projecting point; an unjointed support in the anterior portions of the dorsal and anal fins
words.name: Spine

words.def: spine-like or composed of spines
words.name: Spinous, spiniform, spinate

words.def: the anterior part of the dorsal fin supported by spines
words.name: Spinous dorsal

words.def: respiratory openings behind the eyes in sharks and rays
words.name: Spiracles

words.def: the length of a fish measured from the tip of the snout to the posterior extremity of the hypurals, the expanded bones at the end of the backbone that support the caudal fin
words.name: Standard length (SL)

words.def: almost at the edge
words.name: Submarginal

words.def: below the eye
words.name: Suborbital

words.def: above or on the upper surface
words.name: Superior

words.def: the bone forming a connection between the back of the skull and the pectoral girdle
words.name: Supracleithrum

words.def: above the side
words.name: Supralateral

words.def: a supplemental bone lying along the upper edge of the maxillary
words.name: Supramaxillary

words.def: positioned above the eye
words.name: Supraocular

words.def: above the eye
words.name: Supraorbital

words.def: a flap or filament of skin positioned above the eye
words.name: Supraorbital tentacle

words.def: a bone uniting the shoulder girdle with the skull
words.name: Suprascapular

words.def: the line of union of two bones or plates
words.name: Suture

words.def: a sac filled with gas, lying beneath the backbone
words.name: Swimbladder

words.def: point of junction of the two sides of the jaw
words.name: Symphysis

words.def: similarly arranged on both sides
words.name: Symmetrical

words.def: a member of Teleostei, an infraclass containing most of the bony fishes
words.name: Teleost

words.def: at the end
words.name: Terminal

words.def: marked with little checks or squares, like tiles
words.name: Tessellated

words.def: pertaining to the chest
words.name: Thoracic

words.def: the chest region, just behind the head
words.name: Thorax

words.def: the length from the tip of the snout to the tip of the tail
words.name: Total length

words.def: crosswise
words.name: Transverse

words.def: with three lobes
words.name: Trilobate

words.def: with three cusps or points
words.name: Tricuspid

words.def: terminating abruptly, as if cut off square
words.name: Truncate

words.def: the region of a fish between the head and tail, or the last gill slit and vent
words.name: Trunk

words.def: a small, usually hard excrescence or lump
words.name: Tubercle

words.def: resembling a tube
words.name: Tubiform, tubuliform

words.def: the location from which the type specimen was collected.
words.name: Type locality

words.def: waved
words.name: Undulated

words.def: a papilla through which the urinary waste and gametes leave the body
words.name: Urogenital papilla

words.def: the external opening of the alimentary canal, the anus
words.name: Vent

words.def: pertaining to the abdominal or lower surface
words.name: Ventral

words.def: paired fins behind or below the pectoral fins
words.name: Ventral fins

words.def: fins on the median line of the body; the dorsal, anal, and caudal fins
words.name: Vertical fins

words.def: reduced, or very poorly developed
words.name: Vestigial

words.def: small, slender teeth forming velvety bands
words.name: Villiform teeth

words.def: a bone forming the front part of the roof of the mouth
words.name: Vomer

words.def: teeth on the vomer (see above)
words.name: Vomerine teeth

words.def: An adaptation found in Ostariophysi to improve hearing; includes the Weberian ossicles.
words.name: Weberian apparatus
